author: Soundwavez

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
adds fun balls to bounce around, (fun!) dees balls can (bounce if they hit the ground at an angle), (it can be boped/hurled, about 8 nodes away if you punch it, then it will proceed to bounce for a little while) (they can be picked up as a craftitem when rightclicked) (and, if you get close to a ball, the ball will be automaticly be tossed in the direction you are looking) cool right!

---------if someone asks for the basketball, hockey puck, or socker ball, the mod will be updated. the new update will include all of them.
-(same goes with other ascosiated objects like hoop, goal, and so on...)


-----this mod should work with most games, cause the entity code is basic, and does not require any depends!


enjoy!
name: dees_balls
short_description: adds fun balls with basic physics, to play (socker, basket ball, and hockey, with!
title: DEES BALLZ!
